com.eaglesakura.android.aquery

クラス AbstractAQuery<T extends AbstractAQuery<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eaglesakura.android.aquery.AbstractAQuery<T>
  • 型パラメータ:
    T - the generic type
    直系の既知のサブクラス:
    AQuery

    public abstract class AbstractAQuery<T extends AbstractAQuery<T>>
extends Object
    The core class of AQuery. Contains all the methods available from an AQuery object.

    • ネストされたクラスのサマリー

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • AbstractAQuery

        public AbstractAQuery(android.app.Activity act)
        Instantiates a new AQuery object.
        パラメータ:
        act - Activity that's the parent of the to-be-operated views.

      • AbstractAQuery

        public AbstractAQuery(android.view.View root)
        Instantiates a new AQuery object.
        パラメータ:
        root - View container that's the parent of the to-be-operated views.

      • AbstractAQuery

        public AbstractAQuery(android.app.Activity act,
              android.view.View root)
        Instantiates a new AQuery object. This constructor should be used for Fragments.
        パラメータ:
        act - Activity
        root - View container that's the parent of the to-be-operated views.

      • AbstractAQuery

        public AbstractAQuery(android.content.Context context)
        Instantiates a new AQuery object.
        パラメータ:
        context - Context that will be used in async operations.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • recycle

        public T recycle(android.view.View root)
        Recycle this AQuery object.

        The method is designed to avoid recreating an AQuery object repeatedly, such as when in list adapter getView method.

        パラメータ:
        root - The new root of the recycled AQuery.
        戻り値:
        self

      • inflate

        public android.view.View inflate(android.view.View convertView,
                        int layoutId,
                        android.view.ViewGroup root)
        Inflate a view from xml layout.

        This method is similar to LayoutInflater.inflate() but with sanity checks against the layout type of the convert view.

        If the convertView is null or the convertView type doesn't matches layoutId type, a new view is inflated. Otherwise the convertView will be returned for reuse.

        パラメータ:
        convertView - the view to be reused
        layoutId - the desired view type
        root - the view root for layout params, can be null
        戻り値:
        self
